sequenceSummary

Class SequenceSummarizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • sequenceSummary.SequenceSummarizer

  • public class SequenceSummarizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains functionality for summarizing a frame sequence and returning and image representing this summary.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SequenceSummarizer(FrameSequence seq)
      Given a FrameSequence, returns a PixelImage which summarizes the information using the appropriate SummaryStatistic

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PixelImage getSummary(SummaryStatistic<Pixlet> summStat)
      Returns a summary image of the sequence of images provided in the constructor of this SequenceSummarizer using the summarystatistic summStat.
      PixelImage getSummary(SummaryStatistic<Pixlet> summStat, java.awt.Point p1, java.awt.Point p2, int currFrame)
      Returns a new PixelImage composed of two different components: for the area inside the bounding box defined by points p1 and p2, returns the pixels which summarize the sequence using summarystatistic summStat.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SequenceSummarizer

        public SequenceSummarizer(FrameSequence seq)
                   throws SequenceSummaryException
        Given a FrameSequence, returns a PixelImage which summarizes the information using the appropriate SummaryStatistic

    • Method Detail

      • getSummary

        public PixelImage getSummary(SummaryStatistic<Pixlet> summStat,
                    java.awt.Point p1,
                    java.awt.Point p2,
                    int currFrame)
                      throws SequenceSummaryException,
                             ImageManagementException
        Returns a new PixelImage composed of two different components: for the area inside the bounding box defined by points p1 and p2, returns the pixels which summarize the sequence using summarystatistic summStat. For the area of the image outside of the bounding box, returns the pixels from the image at index currFrame in the frame sequence.
        Parameters:
        summStat - the summary statistic object to use in calculation over the sequence represented by the sequenceSummarizer.
        p1 - one point used to form the bounding box
        p2 - the second point used to form the bounding box.
        currFrame - the time/index of the frame to use in the area outside the bounding box.
        Returns:
        a PixelImage where the summary statistic is calculated over all pixels in the image.
        Throws:
        SequenceSummaryException - (Note that although we allow you to throw an exception in this method if you so choose, you do not need to do so.)
        ImageManagementException - (Note that although we allow you to throw an exception in this method if you so choose, you do not need to do so.)

      • getSummary

        public PixelImage getSummary(SummaryStatistic<Pixlet> summStat)
                      throws SequenceSummaryException,
                             ImageManagementException
        Returns a summary image of the sequence of images provided in the constructor of this SequenceSummarizer using the summarystatistic summStat.
        Parameters:
        summStat - the summary statistic object to use in calculation over the sequence represented by the sequenceSummarizer.
        Returns:
        a PixelImage where the summary statistic is calculated over all pixels in the image.
        Throws:
        SequenceSummaryException - (Note that although we allow you to throw an exception in this method if you so choose, you do not need to do so.)
        ImageManagementException - (Note that although we allow you to throw an exception in this method if you so choose, you do not need to do so.)
